Text: how come there r no ps2 emulators that work???
... because of the huge processing power required to emulate the PS2. No PC today can do it. Someone holla if i'm wrong.

Y'all are all wrong. You can't run them on GIMP computers but on nice comps with good graphics(512mb) or more and a decent processor you can.Search for this. It's note mine but it works. Pcsx2_0.9.4 With 8 Bios
